citation: Proclamation under the Daylight Saving Act 2007 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Daylight Saving Act 2007

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Daylight Saving Act 2007 fix 27 February 2008 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 February 2008

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Premier

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 February 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
